title: SmartBear MCP
name: com.smartbear/smartbear-mcp
description: MCP server for AI access to SmartBear tools, including BugSnag, Reflect, Swagger, PactFlow.

environmentVariables.name: BUGSNAG_AUTH_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: BugSnag auth token. Leave empty to disable BugSnag tools. Learn more: https://developer.smartbear.com/smartbear-mcp/docs/bugsnag-integration

environmentVariables.name: BUGSNAG_PROJECT_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: BugSnag project API key (optional; narrows interactions to a single project). Learn more: https://developer.smartbear.com/smartbear-mcp/docs/bugsnag-integration

environmentVariables.name: REFLECT_API_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: Reflect API token. Leave empty to disable Reflect tools. Learn more: https://developer.smartbear.com/smartbear-mcp/docs/test-hub-integration

environmentVariables.name: SWAGGER_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Swagger API key. Leave empty to disable Swagger tools. Learn more: https://developer.smartbear.com/smartbear-mcp/docs/swagger-portal-integration

environmentVariables.name: PACT_BROKER_BASE_URL
environmentVariables.description: PactFlow/Pact Broker base URL. Leave empty to disable Pact tools. Learn more: https://developer.smartbear.com/smartbear-mcp/docs/contract-testing-with-pactflow

environmentVariables.name: PACT_BROKER_USERNAME
environmentVariables.description: Pact Broker username (alternative to token). Learn more: https://developer.smartbear.com/smartbear-mcp/docs/contract-testing-with-pactflow

environmentVariables.name: PACT_BROKER_PASSWORD
environmentVariables.description: Pact Broker password (alternative to token). Learn more: https://developer.smartbear.com/smartbear-mcp/docs/contract-testing-with-pactflow

environmentVariables.name: ZEPHYR_API_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: The Zephyr Cloud API token for authentication. Learn more: https://support.smartbear.com/zephyr/docs/en/rest-api/api-access-tokens-management.html

environmentVariables.name: ZEPHYR_BASE_URL
environmentVariables.description: The Zephyr Cloud API base url. Should be changed depending on the region of your Jira instance. Learn more: https://support.smartbear.com/zephyr-scale-cloud/api-docs/#section/Authentication/Accessing-the-API
